resources.string: Claim this territory {cost}
Join Or Create A Company To Claim
Build a protection ward to claim this territory.
By claiming this territory, your company can unlock great features as a governing company.
The governing company can collect property upkeep from houses in the settlement.
The governing company can collect fees for trading post transactions made in the territory.
The governing company can collect fees for using public stations in the settlement.
While protected, your structures do not receive damage from enemies.
First three completed faction missions will receive a daily bonus.
Paying for your settlement's upkeep protects it from attack.
Upgrade to get higher tier structures.
Tax rate for harvesting resources on your territory.
A higher tier settlement allows you and your Company to build higher tier stuctures.
You won't be able to manage this territory or buy protection until the upgrade is done or canceled. Are you sure?
Start this town project {cost}
Recall back at any time using the map.
Inn recall is only available once every {numMinutes} minutes.
You are leaving without checking in to the inn.
You are leaving without checking in to the inn, current inn is at {territoryName} {distance}
Are you sure you want to cancel this project? The progress made so far will be lost.
Warning: Are you sure you want to replace the active project? Progress will be lost for the active project of this type.

There's already an active town project. Are you sure you want to start another town project? The current town project will be cancelled and lose all progress.\n Current Project \n {currentProject}, {completionPercent}% completed
This town project is now available for everybody in town to work on.\nCheck it out in <font color='#e1ae3f'>Town Project board</font> in Town Center!
Update Crafting and Refining stations, Turrets, and Fort gates here.
If the upkeep is not paid in time,\na random part of territory will be downgraded.
You've successfully paid upkeep for this territory
This will set a new tax or fee value, which can't be changed again until the next update period.
Residents of this territory should pay property upkeep every 7 days
Trades within this territory are subject to a value tax
Crafting items in this territory costs a fee per item
Refining resources in this territory costs a fee per resource
Sign up for this War at\n<font color='#f1ede2'>a War Board</font> in this town.
Sign up for this Invasion at\n<font color='#f1ede2'>a War Board</font> in this town.
You must be at least level {level} to sign up for the invasion.
Sign ups are not open yet for this invasion.
You have been selected to join the war at {territoryName} from {startTime} to {endTime}.
You have been removed from the {territoryName} war roster.
You have been promoted to {rank} in the war on {territoryName}.
You have been demoted to {rank} in the war on {territoryName}.
You have been selected to defend against the invasion at {territoryName} from {startTime} to {endTime}.
You have been removed from the {territoryName} invasion roster.
You have been promoted to {rank} in the invasion on {territoryName}.
You have been demoted to {rank} in the invasion on {territoryName}.
You do not have the proper role in the company to pay taxes.
Territory must be claimed at the fort!
A fortress that controls {name} territory. Wars and Corrupted invasions are held here.
No one can enter this territory.
Earns up to <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#ffffff">{maxPercent}%</font> of tax revenue
War cannot be declared in this territory for {time}.
War cannot be declared until the next Influence Race.
Sign up at a War Board

You will <font color="#ffffff" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Medium.font">no longer earn Influence</font> in this territory until the next Influence Race.\n\nIf multiple Companies that contributed influence declare war, a random one will be selected.
No company has contributed enough influence yet, so any company would be eligible to declare war.
Your company HAS contributed enough influence to be eligible to declare war.
Your company HAS NOT contributed enough influence to be eligible to declare war. Note: Your influence contribution may take a couple of minutes to process.

For an attacker to be able to declare war on this territory, they must have at least 25 members in their Company and their Faction must first build up enough Territory Influence during an Influence Race.
You will <font color="#ffffff" face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Medium.font">no longer earn Influence</font> in this territory until the next Influence Race.

string.comment: tier is the size of the township e.g. city, town, hamlet
tier is the size of the fortress e.g. fort, batallion, etc

resources.string: Upgrade Crafting stations and Refining stations in the town.
Upgrade Gates, Hardpoints, and Weapons in the fort.
Improve the lifestyle in the territory by activating buffs.
Activate buffs that can help during an invasion.
Activate buffs that can help during a war.
The cooldown period for adding new projects is still active.

Unlocks an additional point to deploy an emplacement (Ballista, Burning Oil Vat, etc.)
Unlocks an additional point to deploy an emplacement (Ballista, Burning Oil Vat, etc.)
Also upgrades any existing Burning Oil Vats.
Also upgrades any existing Burning Oil Vats.
This town project is currently in progress.
Only the governing company's members with permission can start and change a town project.
A town project cannot be started if the territory upkeep is overdue
Territory upkeep needs to be paid every 7 days by the governing company in order to prevent the territory from downgrading.
The territory will downgrade every 24 hours.
Company and Faction bonuses are disabled.
The governing company cannot start a town project.
Territory upkeep is <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Semibold.font">overdue</font>.\nThis territory will downgrade every 24 hours until the upkeep is paid.
Territory upkeep is <font color="#ffffff"><font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Semibold.font">overdue</font>.</font>\nThe governing company cannot start a town project.

The governing company receives income from taxes and fees.\n\n{territoryName} earns <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#ffffff">{currentPercent}%</font> (maximum <font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_semibold.font" color="#ffffff">{maxPercent}%</font>) of tax revenue.

The revenue earned by governing companies is a percentage of the total taxes paid in a world and reliant on how upgraded the territory is. As a company upgrades a territory, it will receive a higher percentage of tax revenue up to the listed maximum percentage.
The governing company can adjust rates of Taxes and Fees.
Items are posted for sale and purchase
No active town project.\n<font face="lyshineui/fonts/Nimbus_Semibold.font">The governing company needs to start a new town project!</font>
The governing company sets the territory tax rates and pays upkeep here.
If the governing company doesn't pay the upkeep on time, <font color="#e8a015">a random part of this territory will get downgraded</font>.
The governing company earns coin from taxes and fees.
Town Project missions are available here.
Sign up for an active War in this territory.
